body_html:
You can't write to individual elements.

Tensorflow (in graph mode) is a declarative framework. You describe the computation first, in python, then use session.run(..) to execute the computation in another step.

With eager mode, you can run in python as you normally would. Please try it out.
body_text:
You can't write to individual elements.
Tensorflow (in graph mode) is a declarative framework. You describe the computation first, in python, then use session.run(..) to execute the computation in another step.
With eager mode, you can run in python as you normally would. Please try it out.
body:
You can't write to individual elements.

Tensorflow (in graph mode) is a declarative framework. You describe the computation first, in python, then use `session.run(..)` to execute the computation in another step.

With eager mode, you can run in python as you normally would. Please try it out.
